aboutDesc: The head office of IE “Abadan Ojak” is located in Ashgabat, Turkmenistan. To ensure the high quality of the services provided, the company has permanent representative offices in the regional centers of Turkmenistan, such as: Akhal, Mary, Balkan (Balkanabat, port of Turkmenbashi, Khazar), Lebap, Dashoguz. The company works closely with partners from Turkey, the United Arab Emirates, the USA, China, Germany, Russia and other CIS countries, which makes it possible to quickly and efficiently provide all types of transport and logistics services, both on the territory of Turkmenistan and abroad.
aboutTrack: Transport the goods, monitor the movement of goods and notify the customer immediately
aboutAirplane: Organization of transportation of regular cargo and charter flights, ensuring transit of goods
aboutCargo: Monitoring the movement of containers and notifying the customer immediately
aboutRailway: Organization of container transportation involving specialized rail vehicles
aboutServicesDescWord: A team of specialists working together to provide high quality cargo transportation services throughout the country and the world.
aboutServicesDescContainer: Container shipping - the best solution for fast and safe cargo transportation.
aboutServicesDescFreight: It is a fast, reliable and convenient way to deliver urgent goods.
aboutServicesDescWarehouse: We provide loading and unloading services and terminal handling of goods of any complexity.
servicesDesc: IE “Abadan Ojak” offers services for Intracity, Intercity, International air / rail / sea and land modes of transportation of goods, as well as providing customs brokerage services in the territory of Turkmenistan. Our experienced specialists can handle all necessary shipping documents and ensure the safe and timely delivery of your cargo, maintaining control throughout the transportation. IE “Hilly Ulag” is your reliable partner in the field of logistics, Your time is our priority.
